questions.text: I can help you plan your trip!
Please answer the following questions correctly!, then I can recommend you some interesting trip planns
Then I can recommend you some interesting trip planning!!!

validationText: Is {input_to_validate} a valid and unique location in the United States? Answer 0 for no, 1 for yes

errors.text: {input_to_validate} is a not valid and unique location in the United States.
Please enter a valid location name!

questions.text: Where do you want to start your trip from?

validationText: Is {input_to_validate} a valid and unique location in the United States? Answer 0 for no, 1 for yes

errors.text: {input_to_validate} is a not valid and unique location in the United States.
Please enter a valid location name!

questions.text: Where are you planning to visit?

validationText: Is {input_to_validate} a valid date (date format is MM/DD/YYYY)? Answer 0 for no, 1 for yes

errors.text: The date format is not valid.
The valid date format is MM/DD/YYYY

questions.text: Which date do you want to start the trip?

validationText: Is {input_to_validate} a valid date (date format is MM/DD/YYYY)? Answer 0 for no, 1 for yes

errors.text: The date format is not valid.
The valid date format is MM/DD/YYYY

questions.text: Which date is the end date of the trip?

validationText: Is {input_to_validate} a valid number of people for a trip? Answer 0 for no, 1 for yes

errors.text: {input_to_validate} is not a valid number of people for a trip.
Please enter a valid number of people!

questions.text: How many people are you planning for?

validationText: Is {input_to_validate} a valid and reasonable budget for a trip? Answer 0 for no, 1 for yes

errors.text: {input_to_validate} is not a valid or reasonable budget for a trip.
Please enter a valid and reasonable budget for a trip!

questions.text: How much is your expected budget (in USD)?

validationText: Create a trip plan from {answers[1]} to {answers[2]} from date {answers[3]} to {answers[4]} with a return trip with a budget of {answers[6]} for {answers[5]} people. Mention specific transport with names and budget, popular local activities to catch up and popular places to eat.

questions.text: Ok, Now you will be redirected to a page showing the trip plans!!!
